knimeNode.name: Get Structures (MOL2)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Knime node to retrieve a (part of) a structure in MOL2 format from KLIFS

fullDescription.intro: Knime node to retrieve a (part of) a structure in MOL2 format from KLIFS
fullDescription.option: Column from the input stream with the structure IDs
Select what you want to retrieve: full complex, protein, pocket, or ligand

ports.inPort: Input with at least a column with structure IDs
ports.outPort: All structural information obtained from KLIFS
